targets.expr: tags.hostname:$host tags.appname:filterlog | extract `<_>,,,<rule_id>,<interface>,<reason>,<action>,<direction>,<version>,<tos>,,<ttl>,<id>,<offset>,<ipflags>,<protonum>,<protocol>,<length>,<source_ip>,<dest_ip>,` | direction:out | top 20 by (source_ip)

tags.hostname:$host tags.appname:filterlog | extract `<_>,,,<rule_id>,<interface>,<reason>,<action>,<direction>,<version>,<tos>,,<ttl>,<id>,<offset>,<ipflags>,<protonum>,<protocol>,<length>,<source_ip>,<dest_ip>,` | direction:in | top 20 by (source_ip)
tags.hostname:$host AND tags.appname:filterlog | stats by(fields.src_port_name,fields.src_port) count() as hits
tags.hostname:$host AND tags.appname:filterlog | stats by(fields.dst_port_name,fields.dst_port) count() as hits
